title: Statesville employees claim supervisor had 'whites only' bathroom at water plant
summary: Three former wastewater treatment plant employees filed a federal lawsuit against the city of Statesville and the facility's managers.
charlotte_impact: Reveals allegations of racial discrimination at a Statesville water plant.

title: CMPD charges suspect with murder in 1990 killing of Kim Thomas
summary: Marion Gales, a longtime person of interest in the 1990 killing of Kim Thomas Friedland, is now charged with murder in the case.
charlotte_impact: Reports charges in a 1990 cold case, bringing closure and justice.

title: Man charged with murder in east Charlotte Food Lion shooting
summary: A murder charge follows a fatal east Charlotte shooting, initiated by an argument, leaving one dead and bystanders at risk as shots hit multiple vehicles.
charlotte_impact: Reports on a fatal Food Lion shooting in east Charlotte.

title: Officials release final report in house fire that left Denny Hamlin's father dead

title: Teen faces murder, kidnapping charges after north Charlotte shooting
summary: A 19-year-old is charged with murder, robbery and kidnapping after a Feb. 9 shooting that left one man dead, according to CMPD.

title: Rock Hill police identify man killed in parking deck shooting

title: Father arrested after courthouse fight with man accused of killing his son
summary: The fight happened between the father of Jamariyae Dixon and Marion McKnight. McKnight is charged with murder in Dixon's death.

title: 'Somebody knows something': Asha Degree's parents plead for answers 26 years after her disappearance

title: She's going to lose her life insurance. Is genetic testing to blame?
